text: In the third year of the reign of King Jehoiakim of Judah, King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon advanced against Jerusalem and laid it under siege.

Now the Lord delivered King Jehoiakim of Judah into his power, along with some of the vessels of the temple of God. He brought them to the land of Babylonia to the temple of his god and put the vessels in the treasury of his god.
The king commanded Ashpenaz, who was in charge of his court officials, to choose some of the Israelites who were of royal and noble descent—

<st data-num="03206" class="">young men</st> in <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="0369 03605">there was no</st> <st data-num="03971" class="">physical defect</st> and who were <st data-num="02896 04758">handsome</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="07919" class="">well versed</st> in <st data-num="03605" class="">all kinds</st> of <st data-num="02451" class="">wisdom</st>, <st data-num="03045 01847">well educated</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="0995" class="">having keen</st> <st data-num="04093" class="">insight</st>,<n id="3" /> and <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> were <st data-num="03581" class="">capable</st><n id="4" /> of <st data-num="05975" class="">entering</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king’s</st> <st data-num="01964" class="">royal service</st><n id="5" />—and to <st data-num="03925" class="">teach</st> them the <st data-num="05612" class="">literature</st> and <st data-num="03956" class="">language</st><n id="6" /> of the <st data-num="03778" class="">Babylonians</st>.<n id="7" />

So the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="04487" class="">assigned</st> them a <st data-num="03117 03117">daily</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">ration</st><n id="1" /> from his <st data-num="04428" class="">royal</st> <st data-num="06598" class="">delicacies</st><n id="2" /> and from the <st data-num="03196" class="">wine</st> he himself <st data-num="04960" class="">drank</st>. They were to be <st data-num="01431" class="">trained</st><n id="3" /> for the next <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st>. At the <st data-num="07117" class="">end</st> of that time they were to <st data-num="05975 ">enter</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king’s</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">service</st>.<n id="4" />

As it turned out,<n id="1" /> among these young men<n id="2" /> <st data-num="01961" class="">were</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">some</st> from <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>:<n id="3" /> <st data-num="01840" class="">Daniel</st>, <st data-num="02608" class="">Hananiah</st>, <st data-num="04332" class="">Mishael</st>, and <st data-num="05838" class="">Azariah</st>.<n id="4" />
But the overseer of the court officials renamed them. He gave Daniel the name Belteshazzar, Hananiah he named Shadrach, Mishael he named Meshach, and Azariah he named Abednego.
But Daniel made up his mind that he would not defile himself with the royal delicacies or the royal wine. He therefore asked the overseer of the court officials for permission not to defile himself.

Then <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> <st data-num="05414 06440">made</st> the <st data-num="08269" class="">overseer</st> of the <st data-num="05631" class="">court officials</st> <st data-num="02617 07356">sympathetic</st> to <st data-num="01840" class="">Daniel</st>.<n id="1" />

But <st data-num="08269 05631">he</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">responded</st> to <st data-num="01840" class="">Daniel</st>, “<st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> <st data-num="03373" class="">fear</st> my <st data-num="0113" class="">master</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>. He is the one <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> has <st data-num="04487" class="">decided</st><n id="2" /> your <st data-num="03978" class="">food</st> and <st data-num="04960" class="">drink</st>. <st data-num="0834 04100">What would happen if</st> he <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> that you <st data-num="06440" class="">looked</st> <st data-num="02196" class="">malnourished</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">in comparison to</st> the other <st data-num="03206" class="">young men</st> your <st data-num="0834 01524">age</st>?<n id="3" /> If that happened,<n id="4" /> you would <st data-num="02325" class="">endanger</st> my <st data-num="07218" class="">life</st><n id="5" /> with the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>!”

<st data-num="01840" class="">Daniel</st> then <st data-num="0559" class="">spoke</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="04453" class="">warden</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> the <st data-num="08269" class="">overseer</st> of the <st data-num="05631" class="">court officials</st> had <st data-num="04487" class="">appointed</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">over</st> <st data-num="01840" class="">Daniel</st>, <st data-num="02608" class="">Hananiah</st>, <st data-num="04332" class="">Mishael</st>, and <st data-num="05838" class="">Azariah</st>:

“<st data-num="04994" class="">Please</st> <st data-num="05254" class="">test</st> your <st data-num="05650" class="">servants</st> for <st data-num="06235" class="">10</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st> by <st data-num="05414" class="">providing</st> us with <st data-num="04480" class="">some</st> <st data-num="02235" class="">vegetables</st> to <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> and <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st> to <st data-num="08354" class="">drink</st>.

Then <st data-num="07200 06440">compare</st> our <st data-num="04758" class="">appearance</st><n id="1" /> with <st data-num="04758" class="">that</st> of<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="03206" class="">young men</st> who are <st data-num="0398" class="">eating</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">royal</st> <st data-num="06598" class="">delicacies</st>;<n id="3" /> <st data-num="06213" class="">deal</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> <st data-num="05650" class="">us</st><n id="4" /> in light of <st data-num="0834" class="">what</st> you <st data-num="07200" class="">see</st>.”
So the warden agreed to their proposal and tested them for 10 days.
At the end of the 10 days their appearance was better and their bodies were healthier than all the young men who had been eating the royal delicacies.

<st data-num="01961" class="">So</st> the <st data-num="04453" class="">warden</st> <st data-num="05375" class="">removed</st> the <st data-num="06598" class="">delicacies</st> and the <st data-num="03196 04960">wine</st><n id="1" /> from their diet<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> them a diet of <st data-num="02235" class="">vegetables</st> instead.
Now as for these four young men, God endowed them with knowledge and skill in all sorts of literature and wisdom—and Daniel had insight into all kinds of visions and dreams.
When the time appointed by the king arrived, the overseer of the court officials brought them into Nebuchadnezzar’s presence.

When the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="01696" class="">spoke</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> them, he did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04672" class="">find</st> among the <st data-num="03605" class="">entire group</st><n id="1" /> anyone like <st data-num="01840" class="">Daniel</st>, <st data-num="02608" class="">Hananiah</st>, <st data-num="04332" class="">Mishael</st>, or <st data-num="05838" class="">Azariah</st>. So they <st data-num="05975" class="">entered</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king’s</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">service</st>.<n id="2" />

In <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">matter</st> of <st data-num="02451" class="">wisdom</st> and<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0998" class="">insight</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="01245" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">them</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">about</st>, he <st data-num="04672" class="">found</st> them to be <st data-num="06235" class="">10</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">times</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">better than</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> of the <st data-num="02748" class="">magicians</st> and <st data-num="0825" class="">astrologers</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> were in his <st data-num="03605" class="">entire</st> <st data-num="04438" class="">empire</st>.
Now Daniel lived on until the first year of Cyrus the king.
